Archive

Humanphobia

** Github Repo**

Humanphobia is an interactive light art wearable.
This project refers to social anxiety, inspired by the cover art of “Awaken, My Love!”, Childish Gambino.

Calculating the distance from the other, the mask shows five different light pattern.
{Idle} - {Random} - {In order} - {Strobe} - {All lights on}

System

Arduino, Ultrasonic sensor, 90 LEDs

Role

Concept, Programming, Fabrication, Documentation

Credit

Dongphil Yoo: Documentation

New York, Fall 2017
